metadata.title: CVE-2024-2496 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A NULL pointer dereference flaw was found in theudevConnectListAllInterfaces() function in libvirt. This issue can occurwhen detaching a host interface while at the same time collecting the listof interfaces via virConnectListAllInterfaces API. This flaw could be usedto perform a denial of service attack by causing the libvirt daemon tocrash.

criterions.comment: libvirt package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
